extendedInfo.description: Launch Boy is a superhero who soars through the air to crash down on criminals everywhere! Bounce on hoodlums and robbers to gain momentum, but watch out for Mom and Dad, though â if they catch him, itâs game over!Purchase and equip fun costumes for power-up abilities to give you an extra boost!Test your luck and watch him go the distance in this simple yet addictive casual game, fun for all ages!

reviews.comment: Not very much replay value. Needs more interaction then just launching the character and letting him fly. Needs some way of helping the outcome other then spending money to get a better character.
reviews.author: Gerard Garay

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: The game works perfectly... Great graphics... But it\'s useless... All yu have to do is launch the boy in d sky n keep watching your screen and do nothin else.... Uninstalling
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Boring
reviews.comment: the most UN interactive game i have ever played. there is not a single creativity involved in making this game. shameful
reviews.author: Kimura Ryosuke

reviews.title: Profoundly lacking...everything.
reviews.comment: Aside from its jerky graphics on both Samsung s2 phone and both nexus 7 tablets... The actual game has no challenge, goals...or point. Weak.
reviews.author: Amber Bamber

reviews.title: Uninstalled
reviews.comment: Calling this a \"game\" is a really lose definition. You launch, the boy flies. No interaction. And you want me to pay cash for some costumes? No. Just no.
reviews.author: Christine Bertolino

reviews.title: Really a nice game
reviews.comment: Its fun to play this game... Jus scared to land near the parents.. It would still be nice if launch boy could collect smthing... :)
reviews.author: Karthivishak Telakulla

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: It\'s nothin 2 do all y do is stare at you like forreal UNINSTALL
reviews.author: Taylor Hill

reviews.title: Great game!
reviews.comment: If you want a simple game and have some time to kill, get it. Nice graphics, too! Would get 5 stars if you could challenge friends on Facebook to beat your high score.
reviews.author: Ran Jones

reviews.title: Lacks any real content.
reviews.comment: I had high hopes as more \"traditional\" launch style games like this are rare on droid. No upgrade system, barely any obstacle variety, and the ONLY unlocks are almost entirely real-cash costumes. This game pales next to any other game of this type.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: Such a fun game to waste time if you\'re bored. Could use a few power ups but fun never the less.
reviews.author: Clark Wilson

reviews.title: Waste of time...
reviews.comment: There are no upgrades without buying, no way to assist your character to go further without buying. I love games like this, but it took no effort whatsoever to make and its a clearly just a quick money grab for them.
reviews.author: David Bardol

reviews.title: Launch boy
reviews.comment: You should let us get the other customs for free.but its a fun game
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Iap bull
reviews.comment: Dev didn\'t even bother with gold. $1 for each costume. Crashes in background. Uninstalled.
reviews.author: Jeremy Stuck

reviews.title: Great time killer
reviews.comment: Reminds me of stuff that got me grounded when i was i kid. Please make a first person mode.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Worthless
reviews.comment: Constantly freezes phone every time i play i have to remove the battery after 5 seconds of play time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: Needs more unlockables, fewer purchase only upgrades. It\'d also be nice to know how to actually achieve the Achievements.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: What
reviews.comment: Where are all the cool upgrades?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Awsome love it i shared on facebook now i have super boy my record is over 11111
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Looks good
reviews.comment: Hoes need a game to play while waiting for a nigga to buy them....finally y\'all made one...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Irritating
reviews.comment: Cool game but entirely too many parents. Right after I fling myself they grab me. You can\'t avoid them unless you purchase a new suit. Extremely irritating.
reviews.author: A Google User
